channel.title: CVE Feed for unspecified -- Exim
channel.description: The latest CVEs for unspecified -- Exim

item.title: CVE-2022-3559|2024-08-03T01:14:02.041Z -- unspecified -- exim
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Exim and classified as problematic. This issue affects some unknown processing of the component Regex Handler. The manipulation leads to use after free. The name of the patch is 4e9ed49f8f12eb331b29bd5b6dc3693c520fddc2. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The identifier VDB-211073 was assigned to this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-3620|2024-08-03T01:14:02.510Z -- unspecified -- exim
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Exim and classified as problematic. This issue affects the function dmarc_dns_lookup of the file dmarc.c of the component DMARC Handler. The manipulation leads to use after free. The attack may be initiated remotely. The name of the patch is 12fb3842f81bcbd4a4519d5728f2d7e0e3ca1445. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-211919.
